description: HNSW index parameters for logical partition storage calculation

notes.M: Number of bi-directional links created for every new element during construction. Higher M leads to higher accuracy but more storage. Default in Faiss: 32, pgvector: 16
notes.ef_construction: Size of the dynamic candidate list during construction. Higher values lead to better recall but slower construction. Default in Faiss: 40, pgvector: 64
notes.storage_calculation: For logical partitions: bytes_per_node = M * 3 * 4 (base layer has 2M edges, upper layers average M edges)
